articles.content: NEW MEXICO (KRQE) - State law enforcement agencies say that drunk driving arrests have dropped since the pandemic began. State police say arrests have fallen 41% between March and December 22, compar… [+265 chars]

articles.title: Can employers make COVID-19 vaccination mandatory? - WFLA

articles.title: Dish Network, Nexstar resolve carriage dispute, restoring local channels in several top 20 TV markets Dish Network, Nexstar resolve carriage dispute, restoring local channels in several top 20 TV markets - Awful Announcing
